Add a page break in a 'Word' document

Source: R/docx_add.R
body_add_break.Rd

Add a page break into an rdocx object

Usage

body_add_break(x, pos = "after")

Arguments

x

an rdocx object

pos

where to add the new element relative to the cursor, one of "after", "before", "on".

See also

Other functions for adding content: body_add_blocks(), body_add_caption(), body_add_docx(), body_add_fpar(), body_add_gg(), body_add_img(), body_add_par(), body_add_plot(), body_add_table(), body_add_toc(), body_append_start_context(), body_import_docx()

Examples

doc <- read_docx()
doc <- body_add_break(doc)
print(doc, target = tempfile(fileext = ".docx"))
